titles.title: Interregional Presidential Primary and Caucus Act of 2000
To provide for interregional primary elections and caucuses for selection of delegates to politial party Presidential nominating conventions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 3/16/2000--Introduced. Interregional Presidential Primary and Caucus Act of 2000 - Divides the United States into six regions of specified States to provide for interregional primary elections and caucuses, according to a specified order, and to provide for selection of delegates to political party presidential and vice presidential national nominating conventions.
